body.name: Butter Dish with Clear Lid, Butter Container Holds for Countertop, Unbreakable Butter Keeper for Home Kitchen Decor, Perfect for East/West Coast Butter, BPA-free, Microwave/Dishwasher Safe (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 39 mins
features: 【Safe Material & Lightweight】AONCO butter holder is made of food-grade material, BPA free. it is lightweight and easy to carry with one hand, and will not be broken by kids or cats; Under the bottom there are four rubber feet to prevent it from moving when taking butter(No included Knife), The transparent lid design allows you to know the butter consumption more intuitively.

【NO MESS DESIGN】No more butter rings on the counter, feet extend below the bottom of the lid so any butter mess on the rim is kept off the table; A typical butter dish with cover leaves a ring of butter everywhere you set it down, but Butter s extended plastic feet keep your counter clean

【Easy Scoop and Clean】Curved ramps help you and the kids easily scoop up butter; Just slide your knife up the ramp; No more chasing cold butter squares around the tray; The top of the ramps act as a scrape plate to clean your knife and collect butter; tablespoon measurements lines can help you better scoop the butter amount you need

【Use safety and good seal】Many of us like to refrigerate our butter, then stick it in the microwave to soften it up before use, Our butter keeper can handle both the Microwave and the dishwasher with ease!Unique snap design provides an excellent sealing to keep butter fresh and clean for longer, without absorbing taste of other food in the refrigerator

【Nice Gift Choose】The ideal size of the butter dish is perfect for both EAST and WEST coast Butter. Simple and modern design fits most home countertop styles and different occasions, such as Christmas, Thanksgiving Day or other memorable days
body.description: A Rustic & Functional Addition to Any Kitchen Butter Dish with Lid for Countertop Functional Butter Dish The durable butter dish suitable for different sizes of butter in East and West, and its keeps your butter at room temperature, as well as protecting it from light, air, and bacteria Non-slip base: The rubber feet of the butter dish prevents the butter from sliding around while you are slicing butter or in daily storage Compatible with refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, oven

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Scoop Ramps & Scrape Edges Easily slide your butter up the curved scoop edges and avoid chasing butter squares around the tray. To clear the knife, scrape excess butter back onto the same edges and either scoop it back on to reapply or leave it in the dish to minimize waste. Extended Feet on Lid Extended feet elevate the lid on your table or countertop, helping you avoid annoying butter rings that are a hassle to clean up. Lightweight and non-slip The butter dish base contains 4 rubber non-slip pads, so that the dish will not slide easily during use, and your pet will not easily knock it over!

Quickly soften your butter Made with safe and edible materials, the Butter Dish is BPA-free and can be heated directly in the microwave to quickly soften your butter. Temperature range (-31℉- 302℉) Keepin’ It Cool You can keep the Butter Dish in the refrigerator to preserve freshness and maximize the expiration date of your butter. Easy to clean Butter dish is dishwasher safe. After use, a quick wash in the dishwasher is all it takes to get your butter holder clean again.

Elevate Your Tablescape The butter dish has three color options (we will customize more colors according to customer needs in the future), and the modern and simple design is suitable for all kinds of home countertops, adding fresh color and variety of fun to your kitchen. Size: 8.5*3.8*2.2 Inches Color: White/Black/Blue/Clear Material: Plastic/BPA-FREE A Rustic & Functional Addition to Any Kitchen Butter Dish with Lid for Countertop Functional Butter Dish The durable butter dish suitable for different sizes of butter in East and West, and its keeps your butter at room temperature, as well as protecting it from light, air, and bacteria Non-slip base: The rubber feet of the butter dish prevents the butter from sliding around while you are slicing butter or in daily storage Compatible with refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, oven

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy & well made.
reviews.reviewText: Needed a covered butter dish for my sneaky butter lov'n cat! Even after she pushes it off the counter it didn't open up! Problem solved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The butter dish is great. It works wonderfully in my camper. Very happy with this dish. It is strong and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a nicely made butter dish with strong plastic. It closes very tight.I actually returned the dish because it closes too tight and it was too hard for my kids to open the dish. I forsaw butter flying off the dish as they struggled to open it. I am glad I had they try it before using the dish. But if you are trying to keep little kids or paws off the butter, this would be a good dish for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The lid fits nice and tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute butter dish
reviews.reviewText: I really like this butter dish as the top stays on and won't fall off without pushing the buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nicely made. Sturdy. I didn't realize that there is a closing mechanism that you would have to open before accessing the butter. It would keep your butter secure, but I felt I didn't want to open the clasp every time I wanted butter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase at a great price point. Its sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice butter dish for everyday use
reviews.reviewText: Simple, sturdy, dishwasher safe, happy with purchase
